product_name: AlpineAire Split Pea Soup - 2 Servings - 2014 Closeout
long_description: AlpineAire "Soup-er" Split Pea Soup offers 2 servings of green split peas with carrots and spices, along with a hint of hickory smoke to make your backcountry meal delicious.
short_description: AlpineAire "Soup-er" Split Pea Soup offers 2 servings of green split peas with carrots and spices, along with a hint of hickory smoke to make your backcountry meal delicious.
